Posts.Content: Hi Nicky, I sent you a friend request on this site so we can kick off writing emails to each other (in the spirit of the community).  Let me know if you didn't get the request. Rachel
Posts.Title: Writing project instead of a blog? July-Dec? Posting here & in the...

Posts.Content: Hi, I'm looking to see if anyone is interested in a writing project where we write penpal style to each other over the next 6 months?  I am new to this site so hope its appropriate to ask for a penpal here. I was diagnosed with breast cancer back in April and now after surgery and emergency fertility treatment, I am on the journey of a 20 week chemotherapy program which will be backed up with radiotherapy for a month.  I am looking for a project to keep me busy for the next 6 months and thought it would be interesting to write but I am more of a letter writer than a blogger.  I think it would be interesting to compare experiences between New Zealand and the UK over the next 6 months.  Is anyone keen to be part of this project?  The intention would be to share our letters exchange in the future with others- they too may find some comfort. Cheers, Rachel Kia Kaha (translation from Maori: Stay Strong)
